mapper.insert: insert into met_data_column(dw_id, tbl_name, col_name, col_type, col_comment) select #{dwId} as dw_id, tbl_name, col_name, col_type, col_comment from view_met_data_column where dw_id = #{dwId} and not exists(select 1 from met_data_column where tbl_name = view_met_data_column.tbl_name and col_name = view_met_data_column.col_name and dw_id = #{dwId})
mapper.update: UPDATE met_data_column t1 SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE concat(t1.tbl_name, t1.col_name) not in (select concat(t2.tbl_name, t2.col_name) from view_met_data_column t2 WHERE dw_id = #{dwId}) and t1.dw_Id = #{dwId};

UPDATE met_data_column t1 SET is_deleted = 0 WHERE concat(t1.tbl_name, t1.col_name) in (select concat(t2.tbl_name, t2.col_name) from view_met_data_column t2 WHERE t2.dw_id = #{dwId}) and t1.is_deleted = 1 and t1.dw_Id = #{dwId};
